plugins.name: Page Status
plugins.description:
Getting Started:

  • The plugin will automatically display the current page you are on
  • Select an emoji from the dropdown.
  • Change the page status
  • Simply select another page and repeat the process
  • Select the first item in the dropdown to remove the status


Changing status will add the selected emoji plus a pipe symbol "|" as a prefix to your page name. You can still edit your page names as you normally would.


Note: this plugin uses the pipe symbol as a delimiter. Changing the name may affect the plugins ability to recognise the current status.


The plugin remains open as you flip between your pages to change statuses. Close it whenever you want.


Settings

The plugin supports up to 8 custom emojis and corresponding statuses. Click on Settings to review the panel and update any of the fields as you wish.


Free

This plugin is free!

plugins.tagline: Quickly indicate to your team the status of the pages you are working on

plugins.name: Ellipse to Rectangle
plugins.description:
Easily convert ellipses to rounded rectangles with this plugin.


How it works

The plugin changes ellipses to rounded rectangles, keeping all properties intact. It processes multiple shapes efficiently and ensures your design files remain clean and organized.


How to use

1. Run the plugin from the Quick Actions or Plugin menu.

2. Select the ellipses you want to convert.

3. The plugin will convert the selected ellipses to rounded rectangles.


The plugin only affects ellipses, leaving other shapes unchanged.

plugins.name: Figma to LVGL
plugins.description:
Unlock the power of LVGL with our Figma plugin, designed to bridge the gap between design and development. This plugin allows you to export your Figma designs into LVGL-compatible XML, paving the way for seamless integration with the upcoming LVGL Editor.


Plugin modes

Use our plugin in two ways:

  1. As a standalone plugin for quick style exports
  2. In Dev Mode as a CodeGen plugin, seamlessly integrated into your development workflow alongside other code generation tools


Current version

Our initial release focuses on the basics: exporting XML style attributes from your Figma designs. While currently limited in scope, this is just the beginning! In the coming months, we'll be rolling out extensive features that align with the LVGL Editor's development, including full component export, nested structures, and more sophisticated styling options.


About LVGL Editor and XML format

The LVGL Editor is crafted to accelerate the visual development of UIs while maintaining the flexibility of code where it matters most. Our XML format is tailored for developers, offering a declarative approach to UI design that emphasizes component-based thinking.


Key features of the XML format:

  1. Component-based design: Think in components to create modular and reusable UI elements.
  2. Declarative widget description: Define widgets in a clear and structured manner.
  3. Nesting support: Easily nest widgets to build complex interfaces.
  4. Developer-friendly code generation: Produce clean and efficient code that developers can easily work with.
  5. Runtime widget loading: Load widgets dynamically at runtime for flexible UI updates.
  6. Real-time preview: Get instant feedback with a live preview of your components.
  7. Component testing: Test new components to ensure quality and performance.


Not a no-code tool

The Editor is designed for developers who are comfortable with coding. The XML format aids in defining the view and provides a preview for rapid design iterations. While visually intensive parts can be crafted using XML, more complex interactions and logic should be handled through code, leveraging the widget's API and defining callbacks as needed.


Embrace the future of UI development with the LVGL Figma Plugin, where design meets code in perfect harmony.
plugins.tagline: Streamline your LVGL embedded UI development

plugins.description:

  2. Upload the CSV file to the plug-in.
  3. Press "Start" :)


  • We have confirmed that it works with comma-separated UTF-8 csv files. (Using Microsoft Excel is highly recommended.)

plugins.name: Variables Toolkit: Find, Swap and Bind Variables
plugins.description:
This plugin helps designers manage and swap Figma variables across different files and libraries. It allows you to:

  1. Search for variables used in your design, whether in selected elements, the current page, or across the entire file
  2. Easily switch variables from one collection to another
  3. Maintain variable modes (like Light/Dark theme settings) when swapping between collections
  4. Keep track of the swap progress with a visual progress bar
  5. Get a clear summary of how many variables were swapped, including any that were skipped or encountered errors
  6. Bind text variables to text layers in your selection.

This is particularly useful when:

  1. Updating designs to use a new library of variables
  2. Auditing which variables are being used in your designs
  3. Ensuring consistency across different files and libraries
  4. Applying your translation variables to the text


The plugin handles all the complexity of variable management behind the scenes, making it simple to maintain and update your design system variables.
plugins.tagline: Swap variables between collections. Find variables. Bind text variables.

130665.name: Variables Toolkit: Find, Swap and Bind Variables
130665.description:
This plugin helps designers manage and swap Figma variables across different files and libraries. It allows you to:

  1. Search for variables used in your design, whether in selected elements, the current page, or across the entire file
  2. Easily switch variables from one collection to another
  3. Maintain variable modes (like Light/Dark theme settings) when swapping between collections
  4. Keep track of the swap progress with a visual progress bar
  5. Get a clear summary of how many variables were swapped, including any that were skipped or encountered errors
  6. Bind text variables to text layers in your selection.

This is particularly useful when:

  1. Updating designs to use a new library of variables
  2. Auditing which variables are being used in your designs
  3. Ensuring consistency across different files and libraries
  4. Applying your translation variables to the text


The plugin handles all the complexity of variable management behind the scenes, making it simple to maintain and update your design system variables.
130665.release_notes:
BIND.
Improved the automatic text variables binding.
Previously, the plugin matched text against the variable name, which caused issues when text in languages like Arabic was detached ‚Äî it couldn‚Äôt be reassigned (since our variables are in English for example).
Now, the plugin compares text with the variable values instead of names, making it possible to correctly reassign even multilingual text.
130665.tagline: Swap variables between collections. Find variables. Bind text variables.

plugins.name: AI Text Generator
plugins.description:
AI Text Generator is an AI-powered plugin designed to streamline the text generation and filling process in Figma.


Key Benefits:

  1. Automatic Text Filling: AI Text Generator intelligently identifies text fields within any selected frame and fills them with relevant content in seconds.
  2. Realistic Content: The plugin generates believable, context-specific text, ideal for mockups, prototypes, and presentations.
  3. Time-Saving: Eliminate the need for manual text entry. With just one click, all text fields are populated, significantly boosting your design efficiency.


Whether you're designing for presentations or building prototypes, AI Text Generator enhances your workflow, enabling you to create lifelike previews effortlessly.

plugins.description:
Clipart.dev - Free Clip Art SVG

Enhance your designs with thousands of free, high-quality SVG clip art assets directly in Figma!

Clipart.dev brings a vast library of professional SVG clip art right into your Figma workspace, eliminating the need to switch between applications or download files manually. With our seamless integration, you can search, preview, and insert beautiful vector graphics into your designs with just a few clicks.


ü™Ñ Key Features:

  1. Extensive Library: Access thousands of free, professionally designed SVG clip art assets
  2. Powerful Search: Find the perfect graphic with our intuitive search functionality
  3. One-Click Insertion: Add SVG logo directly to your Figma canvas with a single click
  4. Drag & Drop Support: Easily drag assets from the plugin panel to your desired location
  5. High-Quality Vectors: All assets are fully scalable SVGs that maintain perfect quality at any size
  6. Optimized Performance: SVGs are automatically optimized for Figma to ensure smooth performance
  7. Regular Updates: Our library is constantly growing with new additions


‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî• Whether you're creating presentations, user interfaces, marketing materials, or illustrations, Clipart.dev provides the visual elements you need to elevate your designs. Save time and streamline your workflow by accessing professional clip art without ever leaving Figma.


üöÄ Perfect for designers, product teams, marketers, and anyone looking to enhance their Figma projects with high-quality visual elements.


üåã Start creating better designs faster with Clipart.dev!

plugins.name: Figma to Flashtalking
plugins.description:
The Figma to Flashtalking plugin is a quick and easy way to convert your Figma project into Dynamic Flashtalking files without needing to write a single line of code.


Full documentation for the plugin can be found on our Help Center.


Key Features

  1. Export Figma projects as Flashtalking-ready ads.
  2. Add robust animations to each layer of your Figma project to create eye-catching movement.
  3. Create dynamic layers with the click of a button and easily tweak elements to be pixel perfect through the dynamic CSS variable.
  4. Use Quick/Full Preview buttons to review ad changes at any point. Previews display and function as they would in the Flashtalking system.
  5. Supports Richload or Standard ads.
  6. Upload your own custom font files.
  7. Files are developer friendly and easy to update post-export.
  8. Save and load your configurations at any point using the Save/Load Plugin Data buttons.


Setting up your Figma Project

The Figma to Flashtalking plugin works by allowing you to specify which elements within your project you want to make dynamic.


Before using the plugin, ensure your Figma project files are set up correctly.

  1. Ads will be determined by the Frame they are contained within.
  2. Frame dimensions need to reflect the desired ad size.
  3. Only layers with live text will be available for dynamic text variable assignment.
  4. Text boxes should not contain multiple font sizes.
  5. Arrow shapes are not supported.


Feedback & Bug Reporting

Have you found an issue or a bug that is keeping you from exporting your ads the way you intended? Have a feature you'd like to see in this plugin? Let us know by reaching out to customsolutions@mediaocean.com.

accepted.name: Flashtalking
accepted.description: The leading global independent ad server for sophisticated marketers.

plugins.tagline: Easily convert your Figma creations into Flashtalking dynamic ads.
